title: [NA] [G4-G1] LF Top/Jungle for comp team
body:
Kragg Hazard is recruiting for a Top and Support for our competitive team. We're currently in a league now that is 6 weeks in and we're in playoff contention. If interested please refer to the below information on how to apply and the requirements. Thank you for your interest!

**_Anyone interested MUST first post their application here before adding [Fidel Krestro]. If you're application is not filled out and posted here then you WILL NOT be considered._**

Requirements:
-Must be able to make Bo3 tourney matches **every Thursday at 7EST**
-Must be able to practice most nights **starting at 8EST**

Application:
-IGN:
-This season's peak rank:
-Current rank:
-Last season's end rank:
-Role:
-Top 5 champs:
-Preferred playstyle:
-Availability:
-U.GG/OP.GG link:

replies.body:
Application:
-IGN: Mr Otter
-This season's peak rank: Gold 2
-Current rank: Gold 3
-Last season's end rank: Gold 1
-Role: Top
-Top 5 champs: Kled, Kennen, Mord, Malph, Rumble, Ornn
-Preferred playstyle: I like tank tops that can help the team carry
-Availability: Any time after 12pm MTN 
-U.GG/OP.GG link: https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Mr+Otter
